## What is mean total number of steps taken per day?

```{r}
activity %>% 
  group_by(date) %>% 
  summarise(step_day = sum(steps,na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
  summarise(mean_step_day = mean(step_day,na.rm = TRUE))
```
